the congressman's decision to forgo a presidential run and instead turn his attention toward a possible gubernatorial run. One source who met with Mike Pence several times over the last few months tells NRO the conservative Hoosier was extremely torn while he deliberated. Another who met with Mike Pence feels his heart was never completely in a bid for president. presidential administrations- most recently under former President Bush - said he expects a strong economic message at the State of the Union address Tuesday. He said the electorate was expecting that focus when Barack Obama assumed office. I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment, which I think is the major problem facing American right now, and I think, and I hope, this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley .
